record.description: They'll shoot golf as well as wisecracks at the scintillating Mirror show. Here is a winsome five all set for their cue in the program directed by Professor Frank H. O'Hara and by Merriel Abbott at Mandel Hall next Friday and Saturday nights. Left to right: Mimi Thomas, Judith Cunningham, Mary Anna Patrick, Betsy Chase, and Helen Ann Leventhal.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
